summary: Bug fixes verification complete - All reported bugs are fixed: 1) /login redirects to homepage, 2) WhatsApp messages have no emojis in templates, 3) MensajesHoy shows contact info, 4) 1.2 Attract hidden from navigation, 5) DELETE admin endpoint exists

minor.issue: Regex pattern has incorrect character ranges (e.g., '2702-27B0' should be '\u2702-\u27B0'). However, this is not critical since emojis were removed from templates directly.

passed_tests: GET /login redirects to / (homepage with login modal) - URL changes from /login to /
GET /public loads correctly - Public website displays Leaderlix content
GET /api/mensajes-hoy/whatsapp/all-contacts - Returns contacts with rules (20 contacts)
Navigation: 1.2 Attract is NOT visible in sidebar
Navigation: 1.1 Find IS visible in sidebar
Navigation: 1.3 Connect IS visible in sidebar
MensajesHoy page: WhatsApp tab shows contact info (name, email, phone, address)
MensajesHoy page: Messages do not contain emojis in templates
critical_code_review_comments: App.js line 310: /login route correctly redirects to / using Navigate component
Layout.jsx lines 110-123: 1.2 Attract section is properly commented out
mensajes_hoy.py lines 139-150: Fallback messages have no emojis, strip_emojis is called but templates are already clean
contacts.py lines 2039-2100: DELETE /admin/delete-google-maps-contacts endpoint properly implemented with audit logging
context_for_next_testing_agent: All bug fixes verified. Login redirect works, public pages load, 1.2 Attract is hidden, admin delete endpoint exists. The strip_emojis regex has minor issues but templates are already emoji-free so it doesn't affect functionality.

login_redirect.description: /login now redirects to / (homepage) which shows login modal
login_redirect.evidence: URL changes from /login to / and login modal is displayed

whatsapp_emojis.description: WhatsApp message templates no longer contain emojis
whatsapp_emojis.evidence: Fallback messages in mensajes_hoy.py lines 141-149 have no emoji characters

mensajes_hoy_contact_info.description: WhatsApp tab shows contact info including name, email, phone, address
mensajes_hoy_contact_info.evidence: Screenshot shows contacts with full details in MensajesHoy page

attract_hidden.description: 1.2 Attract section is hidden from navigation
attract_hidden.evidence: Navigation shows 1.1 Find and 1.3 Connect but NOT 1.2 Attract

admin_delete_endpoint.evidence: API returns 200 with message 'No contacts found with source google_maps'
